name: Black Steel
description:
BlackSteel stealth horror game taking place in a fantasy noir setting inspired
by Dresden Files. Dark alleys and depths of an abandoned car factory full of reanimated metal.
Deep inside an abandoned car factory of Flamel Motors, something went amiss.
Inanimate world of cold steel was disturbed by unknown factors.
Sneak through factory halls, dark warehouses and ominous alleyways, uncover alchemical patterns and reagents that have various effects on surrounding world.
Thief-like stealth experience, hide in shadows, don't make a sound and observe what senses
your enemy is using.
Expand your knowledge of alchemy to unlock new areas and confront dangers.
An intricate story full of twists and revelations
Features :Horror styled on noir movies with a pinch of Dresden Files like fantasy
Objects are alive, beware of EVERYTHING
Stealth gameplay — hide in shadows, watch what you walk on
Alchemy — find alchemy patterns and reagents, use them to unlock areas, solve puzzles and avoid danger
